Title: Siege Weapon Sabotage
Description:
$p, if we're going to hold the nerubians back, we have to deal with their siege weapons. 

Around Tenir's Ascent, there are kegs of black powder to supply our ships for combat. Since the nerubians have caught these ships on the ground, let's put that powder to work.

Gather some barrels, and take them down to the nerubian siege weapons.
ObjectivesText: Destroy 4 siege weapons below Tenir's Ascent.
CompletionText: Were you able to destroy their siege weapons, $n?
RewardText: With those siege weapons destroyed, we're in much better shape. Faerin went ahead to light the Dawntower with Great Kyron. She asked that we meet them there.
